channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Ok this really doesn't have to do with java but whatever it has to do with servers. Ok here is my problem:
//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption //spawn = 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Description
Ok I understand everything there but how do i rotate the Npc and how does the moving work? It is really pissing me off. Help please, also if you don't have anything helpful to say don't say anything. Thanks. -John

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @John6 -John
item.description:
@John6 wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:4, topic:338491”]The walk type is anything 10+ I believe for K-queen its 1183…
The ranges are the perimeter that the NPC walks up to as a boundary…
Does this help? Let me know if not.[/quote]
I know what the walk type is, my question was how you rotate the npc. I know the perimeter is the npc’s walk boundary but can you show me how it works.

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:338491”] //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption //spawn = 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Description

First 0 is npcid
2nd 0 is where it is on the x axis (coord 1) xxxx,----
3rd 0 is where it si on the y axis (coord 2) ----,yyyy
4th 0 is the height 1 is on the ground 0 underground 2 is 2nd story floor
5th 0 is where all the npc can move on the min x axis
6th 0 is where all the npcs can move on the min y axis
7th 0 is where all the npcs can move on the max x axis
8th 0 is where all the npcs can move on the min y axis
9th 0 is walktype, don’t change it.

to use the range its like
2974 tabbed 3001 tabbed 3595 tabbed 2974 tabbed

those are the max positions it can movek[/quote]
Ok my question is answered. Thank-you elf dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption //spawn = 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Description

First 0 is npcid
2nd 0 is where it is on the x axis (coord 1) xxxx,----
3rd 0 is where it si on the y axis (coord 2) ----,yyyy
4th 0 is the height 1 is on the ground 0 underground 2 is 2nd story floor
5th 0 is where all the npc can move on the min x axis
6th 0 is where all the npcs can move on the min y axis
7th 0 is where all the npcs can move on the max x axis
8th 0 is where all the npcs can move on the min y axis
9th 0 is walktype, don’t change it.

to use the range its like
2974 tabbed 3001 tabbed 3595 tabbed 2974 tabbed

those are the max positions it can move

Read full topic
